text: Allah hi hai jo hawaon ko bhejta hai aur woh baadal uthati hain. Phir woh in baadalon ko aasmaan mein phaila deta hai jis tarah chahta hai, aur unhein tukdiyon mein takseem karta hai, phir tu dekhta hai ke baarish ke qatray baadal se tapke chale aate hain. Yeh baarish jab woh apne bandon mein se jinpar chahta hai barsata hai
